hero.description: Software Engineer with experience in back-end development using Golang and Node.js (TypeScript / bun.js). Skilled in designing and implementing distributed, scalable, high-performance systems, with a focus on real-time processing, microservices, and event-driven architecture. Hands-on experience with messaging (Amazon SQS, Kafka), observability, and DevOps (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS), working on game systems and data platforms. Strong focus on software architecture and engineering best practices (SOLID, Clean Code, Design Patterns).

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description1: Back-end focused Software Engineer with experience in scalable, distributed, high-performance systems. I mainly work with Golang and Node.js, and I also have front-end knowledge with React and Next.js.
about-me.description2: On the back end, I have built robust APIs, microservices, and messaging pipelines using Kafka and SQS. I have strong experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Aurora) and NoSQL (DynamoDB, MongoDB, Redis). I apply software engineering best practices such as SOLID, Clean Code, and Design Patterns.
about-me.description3: In addition to back-end work, I have complementary experience with DevOps practices, using CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS services to support scalability and system availability.

description.react: Experience with React and Next.js to build modern interfaces, supporting full-stack projects.
description.go: Primary language for back-end development and high-performance microservices, with excellent concurrency support.
description.javascript: Foundation of web development, used both on the front end and back end.
description.typescript: Static typing to increase safety and scalability in Node.js and front-end projects.
description.nextjs: React framework with SSR/SSG, used to support front-end projects.
description.nodejs: Essential runtime for scalable back ends, REST APIs, and distributed integrations.
description.aws_lambda: Serverless execution on AWS for scalable applications.
description.amazon_s3: Scalable and secure object storage for files and static content.
description.dynamodb: AWS NoSQL database optimized for scalability and low latency.
description.postgresql: Reliable and robust relational database with strong support for complex queries.
description.mysql: Widely used relational database for web applications, with transaction support and high consistency.
description.redis: In-memory database used for cache, queues, and sessions, optimizing performance.
description.rust: High-performance and safe language used in critical scenarios.
description.python: Versatile language used for automation, data analysis, and service support.
description.kafka: Distributed messaging platform for real-time event processing.
description.docker: Essential tool for containerization and environment standardization.
description.kubernetes: Container orchestration for high availability and scalability.

events.title: Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
events.description: I completed my degree at the Catholic University of Brasília.
specification: • Agile methodologies such as Scrum.
• Database fundamentals.
• Algorithms and data structures.
• Object-oriented programming.
• Software engineering and best practices.

events.title: Full Stack Developer - Rizzo Dev
events.description: Development and evolution of responsive web applications with a focus on dashboards and real-time data visualization.
specification: • Development of web applications with React and Next.js for dashboards and real-time data visualization.
• Back-end construction in microservices with Node.js + TypeScript integrated via API Gateway.
• Implementation of Go services for real-time data processing, backtesting, and notifications.
• Development of web scraping in TypeScript for collecting and processing NFT and token data.
• Performance and latency optimization with Redis for caching and concurrent processing.
• Containerized environment with Docker and CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment.

events.title: Software Engineer - Inside Code
events.description: Working on AWS serverless architectures, developing game servers and distributed services with event-driven architecture.
specification: • AWS serverless architectures (API Gateway, Lambda, DynamoDB, RDS, S3, EC2, SQS, EventBridge, Firehose, VPC, Route 53).
• Development and modernization of Go game servers with event-driven architecture for real-time processing.
• Implementation of robust back ends and RESTful APIs with Golang and Node.js integrated with distributed services.
• User state and session management with Redis for high availability and mobility between servers.
• Use of PostgreSQL (RDS) for relational data and DynamoDB for user management and high-scale data.
• Orchestration of asynchronous processing and distributed queues with Amazon SQS and EventBridge.
• Creation of data pipelines and a data lake with Firehose and S3 for collecting events and metrics.
• Production of UML diagrams, database modeling, and definition of integration flows between microservices.
• Application of advanced software engineering patterns with unit, integration, and load testing.

events.title: Postgraduate - MBA in Full Cycle Architecture
events.description: Advanced studies in software architecture and distributed systems.
specification: • Distributed and scalable architectures.
• Microservices and event-driven architecture.
• DevOps and CI/CD.
• Cloud and high availability strategies.
• Security and best practices in modern software.
